articles.author: Ritu Sharma
articles.title: 1st Time Since Bloody Clash With PLA, India Sends ‘Loud & Clear’ Message To China From Tawang - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Indian Defense Minister Rajnath Singh’s message to China could not have been any louder on the festival of Dusshera, which marks the victory of good over evil in Hindu Mythology. Rajnath Singh chose forward posts in Arunachal Pradesh, a state repeatedly claim…
articles.content:
Indian Defense Minister Rajnath Singh’s message to China could not have been any louder on the festival of Dusshera, which marks the victory of good over evil in Hindu Mythology.
